https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ohBJhAI7YJrlYmnr4czCvZj1FW7.jpg When a reservation mix-up at a mountain resort forces a newly-single travel writer to share a cabin with a handsome widower and his precocious daughter over the holidays, their lives are transformed by the magic of Christmas and the unexpected power of love.
